DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study look impact use Peanut Labor Ball ( PLB ) epidural anesthesia patient never give birth . The study measure impact length labor , cesarean section rate , operative vaginal delivery rate ( vacuum forceps use ) , third fourth degree laceration rate . This study determine impact PLB use compare two cohort nulliparous patient : one PLB use one traditional wedge pillow positioning . If benefit relate use PLB demonstrate , intention labor room stock PBL use standard care . This study test follow hypothesis : 1 . The Peanut Labor Ball ( PLB ) impact cesarean section operative vaginal delivery rate low risk nulliparous patient receive epidural anesthesia compare similar cohort use traditional wedge pillow positioning . 2 . Using PLB impact amount time epidural placement complete dilation time second stage labor , compare control cohort . 3 . Use PLB impact third fourth degree laceration rate compare control cohort .
DOC.brief_title: Use Peanut Labor Ball Following Epidural Anesthesia
